code: import axiosClient from"./axiosClient";const ProductAPI={getAPI:()=>{const url="/products";return axiosClient.get(url);},getCategory:query=>{const url=`/products/category${query}`;return axiosClient.get(url);},getDetail:id=>{const url=`/product/${id}`;return axiosClient.get(url);},getPagination:query=>{const url=`/products/pagination${query}`;return axiosClient.get(url);}};export default ProductAPI;
